‌【Smooth Rolling Action】Crafted from premium industrial-grade materials, the foam roller and PP ergonomic handles are built to withstand years of intensive use. name: Professional Foam Roller 14.5 inch Firm Deep Tissue Massage
short_description: Engineered for Safety, Designed for Performance: The only foam roller with a patented Spine Groove to protect your spine while enhancing flexibility and muscle health. Perfect for active people and athletes seeking peak recovery without the risk of spine injury.

How it works: The patented SpineGroove foam roller is designed to cradle the spine, calves or arms for deep muscle release. This unique design sets it apart from all the other foam rollers. The padded texture massages the muscles while stimulating blood flow, flushing toxins and metabolites from the area. The rigid inner core provides the necessary support and makes the roller resistant to wear and highly durable.

Peak performance: SpineGroove was designed by a team of North America therapists and tested by high-performance athletes to deliver fast and safe post-exercise recovery. Vertical cuts in the roller waves assist with deep fascia release and specific trigger point releases while not injuring the tissue and nerves.

The patented SpineGroove foam roller is specifically designed to cradle and reset your spine, rib-cage, neck, arms, forearms, palms, upper thighs, calves, shins, and feet while experiencing a deep myofascial and trigger point release. Its textured surface and specially designed profile and massage zones create drag on the tissue allowing fascial adhesions and layers to melt and reset.

The multi-layer cross-section padding allows for deep tissue massage of all the muscles while protecting them from nerve irritation and stimulating blood and lymphatic flow. With SpineGroove, you can experience all the benefits of foam rolling without worrying about damaging your spine and soft tissue, ensuring optimal recovery while experiencing less pain during usage.

name: 321 Strong Foam Roller - Medium Density Deep Tissue Massager for Muscle Massage and Myofascial Trigger Point Release, with 4K eBook
short_description: PATENTED TECHNOLOGY: Relieve sore muscles, perform deep tissue massage and acupressure with our medium density massage roller, great for relieving back pain. The patented projections extend deep into soft tissue and fascia to break up knots and calm tense muscles in your neck and back

SUPERIOR QUALITY: Our textured foam roller mimics the hands, fingers, and thumbs of a physical therapist, but in the privacy of your own home. It features a super-strong and lightweight core, and is entirely wrapped in BPA-free closed cell EVA foam for a premium look and feel. The density of the projections, and their unique shape and pattern offer effective results with a comfortable level or penetration into the soft tissue and muscle fascia

TARGETED RELIEF FROM PAINFUL ADHESIONS: Exceptionally suited for a comfortable yet effective deep tissue massage, our product is designed from the ground up to flush lactic acid from muscle tissue, enhance pre- and post- workout stretching and recovery. It is firm enough to offer therapy to the muscle groups on either side of the spine, yet soft enough to not hurt the spine when rolled directly

UP YOUR STRETCH GAME: Our massage roller offers three massage zones that allow you to dial in your massage intensity. The smallest projections are like a massage therapists finger tips, the larger projections mimic the thumbs, and the largest ones feel like the base of the palms. There is no hard plastic in our product, so you won’t crack it, and it supports an incredible amount of weight so it won’t deform or flex

QUICK AND EFFECTIVE: Foam rolling for just 20 minutes after exercise, and again at 24 and 48 hours has been clinically proven to reduce recovery time by 20%, increase flexibility by 10%, and reduce soreness by as much as 30%. They have also been shown to decrease the risk of injuries in the first place
